article.headline: Marist 79, Iona 53
article.story: NEW ROCHELLE, N.Y. (AP) -- Jared Jordan scored 21 points and had seven assists to help Marist beat Iona 79-53 on Sunday. Ryan Stilphen added 10 points for the Metro Atlantic-leading Red Foxes (19-7, 11-4 MAAC), who won their fourth in a row after losing three of four. Milan Prodanovic, John Kelly and Justin Marshall each scored 10 points for the host Gaels (1-24, 1-14), who are tied for last in the 10-team MAAC. Jordan, the NCAA Division I leader in assists, had 14 points and five assists in the first half as the Red Foxes hit seven 3-pointers to build a 42-25 lead at the break. Marist extended the lead to 72-44 after Joe Keegan sank a free throw with 3:14 remaining.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
